name: VPNConnection
description: Creates a new VPN connection between an existing virtual private gateway and a VPN customer gateway.

properties.name: Type
properties.description: The type of VPN connection this virtual private gateway supports.

properties.name: CustomerGatewayId
properties.description: The ID of the customer gateway. This can either be an embedded JSON object or a reference to a Gateway ID.

properties.name: StaticRoutesOnly
properties.description: Indicates whether the VPN connection requires static routes.

properties.name: Tags
properties.description: The tags that you want to attach to the resource.

properties.name: VpnGatewayId
properties.description: The ID of the virtual private gateway. This can either be an embedded JSON object or a reference to a Gateway ID.
